body: I was watching Niall’s Instagram stories and on the wall next to the one with Obama’s picture, there are five frames hung that look like One Direction images and that made my heart so soft. Does he really have a wall dedicated to pictures of him and the boys?

summary: A/N: Happy Thanksgiving to my beautiful American followers! I hope your day is full of good food, good times with loved ones,...
body:
Sweet As Pie

A/N: Happy Thanksgiving to my beautiful American followers! I hope your day is full of good food, good times with loved ones, and lots of love! To all my wonderful non-American followers, I wish you the exact same on this absolutely freezing Thursday! I’m currently working on my 3 pieces for my 25 Days of Christmas, so I don’t have too much time to work on a full piece, but I wanted to throw some Thanksgiving fluff at you all! Have a fantastic day my loves!💛

Word Count: 1.5k

Masterlist

The feeling of dough beneath your fingers had always brought you a sense of joy. Knowing that this ball of flour and egg could be made into something that brought smiles to the faces of your loved ones, was why you slaved away in the kitchen for days during this time of year. Thanksgiving had never been made a huge deal while growing up. Yes, you ate the typical turkey, mashed potatoes, and stuffing, but there were other holidays that were held on a higher pedestal. But, within the past couple of years, making sure to celebrate and go above and beyond for each and every holiday was one of your top priorities, for many reasons. The biggest of which was seated next to you, watching your movements very intently.

“Mumma, why you doing ‘at?”

“I have to press all the dough together bubba. It’s called kneading. When you press it all together, the little workers inside get big and strong so that our pie doesn’t fall apart in the oven.”

“But you squashing the workers! We gotta save ‘em!” your son definitely took after his father when it came to his heart.  At 3 years old, there was nothing that the beautiful little boy in front of you didn’t care about.

“No, little love! That’s what they like. You know how you like when Daddy rubs your back at night? It’s the same! Here, do it with me.” You picked up his small hands and placed them on top of the soft dough, “Push it with your fingers, like this.”

“I’m sorry, guys.” He whispered, patting the dough before digging his still somewhat chubby fingers in, “But, my Mumma says you like it, so I guess it’s okay.” After a bit of hesitation, his face began to light up.

Frank Sinatra’s smooth voice echoed through your downstairs, his Christmas album being the only suitable thing you could think to listen to while making the Thanksgiving treats. Harry had helped you set up your Christmas tree last weekend – it stood strong and tall in the corner of your living room, giving off a faint glow from the white lights. Anne had gifted the two of you beautiful embroidered stockings, white for you and green for Harry, on your first Christmas together, many years ago. And then, when your son was born, his own red stocking was added, completing the ambiance hanging on your fireplace mantel.

“What is Fanksgiving for, Mumma?” another feature that he received from Harry was his striking green eyes. They were a green that put even Harry’s to shame, and he looked over at you with them wide as saucers.

“It’s a holiday we celebrate back in Mumma’s home –“

“With Nona and Pop?”

“Yeah buddy, with Nona and Pop. It’s a holiday to celebrate the things we are most thankful for. The things that make our tummies all warm and happy.” Your hands quickly ran over his stomach, leaving a light trail of flour, and he let out a string of giggles.

“Well, how come Nana doesn’t do it?”

“Thanksgiving is a holiday that is most celebrated in America. You know, the place we go lots for Daddy’s work and to see Uncle Jeff? It’s not really a holiday here, so Nana never had a reason to. But she wanted to start celebrating when I met Daddy, to make me happy and not miss home too much.”

The first Thanksgiving you spent in London was one you’ll never forget. The entire day before, you had been lounging in your sweatpants, moping because your mom kept sending you photos of her and your siblings prepping all the food. That was the first holiday you weren’t going to be celebrating with your family. Half of a pint of ice cream later, Harry showed up on your doorstep, informing you that his mom, sister, and himself had planned a traditional American Thanksgiving, just for you. To this day, you still thanked her for making you feel part of the family so early, and since then, had continued the tradition. It was something you and Harry had agreed on, so that your kids would know about the traditions you grew up with, as well as his.

“I know what I’m fankful for, Mumma.”

“Yeah? And what’s that?”

Suddenly, two small, flour covered hands were placed on your cheeks, making sure you were looking right at the toddler sitting on the counter.

Much to his surprise, none of Harry’s family heard him enter the house – he chalked it up to the music cancelling out any outside noise. Upon entering and not hearing the pitter patter of feet running towards him, his curious mind led him to search the house. Although, he didn’t have to go far, as he could distinctly hear the giggles of his spitting image coming from the kitchen. The sight before him made him stop in his tracks, somewhat hidden by the kitchen entryway, and careful not to disturb the picturesque scene before him. His wife stood in a simple white shirt and jeans, hair tucked away above her head, and away from her face, while their son was perched on his knees just to her left, holding his mother’s face between his two small hands.

“You and Daddy. You make my tummy warm and happy.”

Not knowing the context of the conversation made the words out of his son’s mouth that much sweeter. There wasn’t a day that went by that the couple didn’t get comments about how much their son looked like Harry, whether it be online or in person, but he definitely was a Mumma’s boy. From the day he was born, the two had been the best of friends, and it warmed Harry’s heart anytime he got to watch their relationship bloom.

“That’s very sweet, my little love. I am the most thankful for you and Daddy too.” your voice finally sounded, after a short pause at your sons’ words.

The record player stopped momentarily, as the next song was preparing to play through the house speakers, and the soft murmur of an ‘I love you’ could be heard falling from your lips, while you pressed your forehead against your sons much smaller one. The moment didn’t last long, due to the song finally switching over and Jingle Bells begin playing, leaving your son squealing and jumping into your arms.

“Dance, Mumma! Like Daddy!”

“Like Daddy, huh? You mean like this?” the questions slipped from your mouth as your carefully jumped and slid to your left a few times, “Or like this?” your next move was a couple of quick twirls and wild head shakes. The two of you continued your dance routine around the kitchen, your eyes closed and heads occasionally being thrown back in laughter. Neither had seen Harry admiring the lovely memories being created in front of his eyes. Some that they would talk about in future holidays. Silently, Harry pulled out his phone and started recording as soon as loud giggles fell from the lips of the two most important people in his life. Not even 5 seconds after filming began, small green eyes looked directly in Harry’s direction.

“DADDY!” wiggling out of your arms, their toddler ran directly over to his father’s legs.

“Hey dude.” Harry bent down and swiftly lifted his son into his arms, “Havin’ a good day with Mumma?”

“Yeah! We went to get grocies, and had lunch wif Gemmy, and napped, and now we making pies for Fanksgiving wif Nana! We smooshed little workers Daddy!”

“Smooshed ‘em all up, yeah? Hope you made sure they were happy with that.” His son nodded furiously, “Good. Well, it sounds like you guys had a busy day. Maybe I should just go back out, leave you alone.”

“No Daddy! You gotta help us wif pies! You supposed to spend Fanksgiving with us, ‘cause Mumma said you gotta spend it with who makes your tummy feel all happy!”

Finally, Harry raised to his feet to come stand next to you and wrapped his arm around your waist. He had been working extra-long hours lately, trying to finish up his new album, so when he got the chance to get home early, and enjoy the night with his family, you counted your lucky stars.

“Well, we do have one smart Mumma, don’t we bub? Now, how about you show me those little workers you helped earlier.”

With incoherent sentences about his time with the workers leaving his mouth, he scurried off towards the counter, climbing back up the small step stool. But you and Harry briefly stayed behind, basking in the time you had together.

“How long were you standing there?”

His fingers came up and gently wiped away some of the tiny flour handprints left on your cheeks from earlier, “Since he said we gave him the tummy tingles.” Looking directly at you, the sentiment was clear in his green eyes and you knew he was about to say something sappy, “You’re the best mum I could possibly imagine. Thank you.”

“Don’t make me cry before we even get to your mother’s.” you peaked him quickly on the corner of his mouth, “You know how sappy I always get at this dinner. Now come on, before we lose our son to the pie dough.”

“Happy Fanksgiving, my love.”

Tagging: @emotionally-imbruised @theasstour (because I’ve even snapping them about this for ever) and @writingsfromlee (because she supports me in everything and I love her so very dearly)

“But you squashing the workers! We gotta save ‘em!” your son definitely took after his father when it came to his heart.  At 3 years old, there was nothing that the beautiful little boy in front of you didn’t care about.

“No, little love! That’s what they like. You know how you like when Daddy rubs your back at night? It’s the same! Here, do it with me.” You picked up his small hands and placed them on top of the soft dough, “Push it with your fingers, like this.”

“I’m sorry, guys.” He whispered, patting the dough before digging his still somewhat chubby fingers in, “But, my Mumma says you like it, so I guess it’s okay.” After a bit of hesitation, his face began to light up.

Frank Sinatra’s smooth voice echoed through your downstairs, his Christmas album being the only suitable thing you could think to listen to while making the Thanksgiving treats. Harry had helped you set up your Christmas tree last weekend – it stood strong and tall in the corner of your living room, giving off a faint glow from the white lights. Anne had gifted the two of you beautiful embroidered stockings, white for you and green for Harry, on your first Christmas together, many years ago. And then, when your son was born, his own red stocking was added, completing the ambiance hanging on your fireplace mantel.

“What is Fanksgiving for, Mumma?” another feature that he received from Harry was his striking green eyes. They were a green that put even Harry’s to shame, and he looked over at you with them wide as saucers.

“It’s a holiday we celebrate back in Mumma’s home –“

“With Nona and Pop?”

“Yeah buddy, with Nona and Pop. It’s a holiday to celebrate the things we are most thankful for. The things that make our tummies all warm and happy.” Your hands quickly ran over his stomach, leaving a light trail of flour, and he let out a string of giggles.

“Well, how come Nana doesn’t do it?”

“Thanksgiving is a holiday that is most celebrated in America. You know, the place we go lots for Daddy’s work and to see Uncle Jeff? It’s not really a holiday here, so Nana never had a reason to. But she wanted to start celebrating when I met Daddy, to make me happy and not miss home too much.”

The first Thanksgiving you spent in London was one you’ll never forget. The entire day before, you had been lounging in your sweatpants, moping because your mom kept sending you photos of her and your siblings prepping all the food. That was the first holiday you weren’t going to be celebrating with your family. Half of a pint of ice cream later, Harry showed up on your doorstep, informing you that his mom, sister, and himself had planned a traditional American Thanksgiving, just for you. To this day, you still thanked her for making you feel part of the family so early, and since then, had continued the tradition. It was something you and Harry had agreed on, so that your kids would know about the traditions you grew up with, as well as his.

“I know what I’m fankful for, Mumma.”

“Yeah? And what’s that?”

Suddenly, two small, flour covered hands were placed on your cheeks, making sure you were looking right at the toddler sitting on the counter.

Much to his surprise, none of Harry’s family heard him enter the house – he chalked it up to the music cancelling out any outside noise. Upon entering and not hearing the pitter patter of feet running towards him, his curious mind led him to search the house. Although, he didn’t have to go far, as he could distinctly hear the giggles of his spitting image coming from the kitchen. The sight before him made him stop in his tracks, somewhat hidden by the kitchen entryway, and careful not to disturb the picturesque scene before him. His wife stood in a simple white shirt and jeans, hair tucked away above her head, and away from her face, while their son was perched on his knees just to her left, holding his mother’s face between his two small hands.

“You and Daddy. You make my tummy warm and happy.”

Not knowing the context of the conversation made the words out of his son’s mouth that much sweeter. There wasn’t a day that went by that the couple didn’t get comments about how much their son looked like Harry, whether it be online or in person, but he definitely was a Mumma’s boy. From the day he was born, the two had been the best of friends, and it warmed Harry’s heart anytime he got to watch their relationship bloom.

“That’s very sweet, my little love. I am the most thankful for you and Daddy too.” your voice finally sounded, after a short pause at your sons’ words.

The record player stopped momentarily, as the next song was preparing to play through the house speakers, and the soft murmur of an ‘I love you’ could be heard falling from your lips, while you pressed your forehead against your sons much smaller one. The moment didn’t last long, due to the song finally switching over and Jingle Bells begin playing, leaving your son squealing and jumping into your arms.

“Dance, Mumma! Like Daddy!”

“Like Daddy, huh? You mean like this?” the questions slipped from your mouth as your carefully jumped and slid to your left a few times, “Or like this?” your next move was a couple of quick twirls and wild head shakes. The two of you continued your dance routine around the kitchen, your eyes closed and heads occasionally being thrown back in laughter. Neither had seen Harry admiring the lovely memories being created in front of his eyes. Some that they would talk about in future holidays. Silently, Harry pulled out his phone and started recording as soon as loud giggles fell from the lips of the two most important people in his life. Not even 5 seconds after filming began, small green eyes looked directly in Harry’s direction.

“DADDY!” wiggling out of your arms, their toddler ran directly over to his father’s legs.

“Hey dude.” Harry bent down and swiftly lifted his son into his arms, “Havin’ a good day with Mumma?”

“Yeah! We went to get grocies, and had lunch wif Gemmy, and napped, and now we making pies for Fanksgiving wif Nana! We smooshed little workers Daddy!”

“Smooshed ‘em all up, yeah? Hope you made sure they were happy with that.” His son nodded furiously, “Good. Well, it sounds like you guys had a busy day. Maybe I should just go back out, leave you alone.”

“No Daddy! You gotta help us wif pies! You supposed to spend Fanksgiving with us, ‘cause Mumma said you gotta spend it with who makes your tummy feel all happy!”

Finally, Harry raised to his feet to come stand next to you and wrapped his arm around your waist. He had been working extra-long hours lately, trying to finish up his new album, so when he got the chance to get home early, and enjoy the night with his family, you counted your lucky stars.

“Well, we do have one smart Mumma, don’t we bub? Now, how about you show me those little workers you helped earlier.”

With incoherent sentences about his time with the workers leaving his mouth, he scurried off towards the counter, climbing back up the small step stool. But you and Harry briefly stayed behind, basking in the time you had together.

“How long were you standing there?”

His fingers came up and gently wiped away some of the tiny flour handprints left on your cheeks from earlier, “Since he said we gave him the tummy tingles.” Looking directly at you, the sentiment was clear in his green eyes and you knew he was about to say something sappy, “You’re the best mum I could possibly imagine. Thank you.”

“Don’t make me cry before we even get to your mother’s.” you peaked him quickly on the corner of his mouth, “You know how sappy I always get at this dinner. Now come on, before we lose our son to the pie dough.”

“Happy Fanksgiving, my love.”

Tagging: @emotionally-imbruised @theasstour (because I’ve even snapping them about this for ever) and @writingsfromlee (because she supports me in everything and I love her so very dearly)

body:
Mi opinión sobre Larry Stylinson

(voy a escribir en español porque es mi lengua materna y así a ver si me explico mejor)

Mirad, yo hace tiempo que no estaba tan conectada con los chicos de 1d ni con Larry ni nada y últimamente estoy volviendo a ser la fangirl que era y me estoy dando cuenta de cosas que hace 3 años no veía tan claras o no las veía directamente. Además de muchas cosas más que no me cuadran y me gustaría saber alguna respuesta.

1. Si algo está más claro que nunca es que Harry no es hetero. No sé si es bisexual, gay o qué pero hetero: no.

2. No sé qué pensar del babygate. Hay veces que creo que es todo mentira (por el modo en el que se llevó el embarazo, la “cirugía” de Briana y demás. Otras pienso que es real porque el niño tiene cierto parecido a Louis. En ningún momento he pensado que Louis fuera un mal padre, ni se me pasa por la cabeza vamos, a L le encantan los niños y eso está clarísimo.

Por otro lado, el hecho de que la familia de Briana (incluso Freddie) tuviera que ser desalojada por los incendios y que Louis no hiciera absolutamente nada (públicamente) me da que pensar porque si algún familiar mío estuviera ahí lo primero que haría sería preocuparme y luego anunciar a los fans que dejen de llenarme las redes sociales preguntándome si mi hijo está bien.

Otra cosa que me llamó mucho la atención fue que Niall mencionara a Freddie en la entrevista con George Ezra, es decir, después de varias semanas con Harry MIA en Londres y Louis apareciendo solo para X Factor (lo que supuso un incremento de movimiento por las Larry shippers/ larries/ Larry Organisation etc), entrevistan a Niall y a este se le ocurre mencionar al hijo de L sin venir a cuento casi. A mí personalmente me parece muy extraño porque del hijo de Liam no sabemos absolutamente nada.

3. Harry y Louis tienen toda la intimidad del mundo cuando quieren. Vamos, Harry lleva dos semanas y media desaparecido. Como ya he dicho antes, a Louis solo se le ve para ir a The X Factor, es más, solo gracias a su fotógrafo sabemos que está en Los Ángeles ya (sí, Niall dijo que se verían esta semana pero nada más). Tenemos fotos de Liam en el aeropuerto y nadie ha visto a Louis coger un avión hacia Los Ángeles, vamos no me fastidies, estos señores están haciendo lo que les da la gana sin que nadie se entere y me alegro muchísimo por ellos.

4. No sé qué me perdí estos años que he estado más desconectada de 1D y Larry pero veo a mucha gente shippear Zarry como si fuera real. Según lo que he podido ver es que tienen “tatuajes a conjunto” (una flor en el brazo, un corazón y la calavera). Otro video que Harry dice supuestamente a Zayn sobre Two Ghosts que la escribió la primera vez que ÉL le dejó. Sinceramente me parece tan absurdo que se crea en Zarry antes que en Larry…

5. Esto ya es más opinión personal que cosas relacionadas con la actualidad de Larry. Sinceramente después de tantos años es normal que salgan dudas (no solo en tema Larry sino en cualquier cosa de la vida cotidiana), pero que ellos sigan haciendo cosas taaaan sospechosas me pone de los nervios. Creo que si alguien está hasta los huevos de que traten una amistad como relación amorosa, no dice en un tuit que es una mierda y ya está. Estoy estudiando periodismo y en una asignatura relacionada con las relaciones públicas, nos dijeron que muchas empresas tratan las “crisis” o los errores de diferentes maneras entre otras como pueden ser las cortinas de humo, ignorar lo que pasa, tirar la culpa a otros, o comunicados oficiales siendo sinceros, etc. Sin duda alguna, si yo fuera responsable de la comunicación de un artista que está cansado de que le acusen de algo, no pondría un tuit contestando a un fan para “aclarar las cosas”, tampoco diría mensajes que puedan dar a controversia sino que haría un vídeo o una rueda de prensa explicando y dejando que surjan las preguntas de la gente y poder dar explicaciones reales.

Ahora como fan, me gustaría que si en algún momento se sabe la verdad sobre Larry, si ya no están juntos o algo; solo espero que alguno de los dos tenga la decencia de decir si de verdad alguna vez ha pasado algo entre ellos porque creo que la gente se merece explicaciones más allá de saber si Larry es real o no. A mí personalmente me gustaría que escogieran cualquier vídeo con momentos Larry “innegables” y me explicasen qué pasaba ahí realmente si no fue una relación amorosa o sexual, que me dieran una explicación para todas esas “pruebas” que se han ido recogiendo a lo largo de los años de 1d.

6. Sobre The X Factor y el contrato de Louis, etc. Yo nunca he sido una persona que ha entendido demasiado bien lo de los contratos de los chicos ni los managers, etc. (Obviamente sé que Modest era una gran escoria y tal). Ahora con todo el tema de Little Mix yéndose de Modest, no sé que va a pasar con Louis y los chicos porque sé que L tiene su propia discográfica, que H está con Columbia y tal. Cómo he estado estos años algo desconectada tampoco puedo decir mucho más porque no sé exactamente como han ido las cosas. Por lo que veo a día de hoy, creo que Louis está esperando a que acabe The X Factor, no sé si para romper con Simon Cowell o qué pero espero que Louis sepa lo que hace y que todo le vaya bien porque estoy deseando LT1 con toda mi alma y no aguanto más sin escuchar su música Ajajaja.

Quiero recalcar que todo esto son pensamientos míos, que no es nada que yo pueda sacar pruebas o algo de eso, solo con meterse en Twitter y en las cuentas que hablan de L y H se puede ir sabiendo cosas de ellos, que es lo que yo hago. Qué bien me he quedado diciendo todo lo que pensaba ajajaja

Por otro lado, el hecho de que la familia de Briana (incluso Freddie) tuviera que ser desalojada por los incendios y que Louis no hiciera absolutamente nada (públicamente) me da que pensar porque si algún familiar mío estuviera ahí lo primero que haría sería preocuparme y luego anunciar a los fans que dejen de llenarme las redes sociales preguntándome si mi hijo está bien.

Otra cosa que me llamó mucho la atención fue que Niall mencionara a Freddie en la entrevista con George Ezra, es decir, después de varias semanas con Harry MIA en Londres y Louis apareciendo solo para X Factor (lo que supuso un incremento de movimiento por las Larry shippers/ larries/ Larry Organisation etc), entrevistan a Niall y a este se le ocurre mencionar al hijo de L sin venir a cuento casi. A mí personalmente me parece muy extraño porque del hijo de Liam no sabemos absolutamente nada.

3. Harry y Louis tienen toda la intimidad del mundo cuando quieren. Vamos, Harry lleva dos semanas y media desaparecido. Como ya he dicho antes, a Louis solo se le ve para ir a The X Factor, es más, solo gracias a su fotógrafo sabemos que está en Los Ángeles ya (sí, Niall dijo que se verían esta semana pero nada más). Tenemos fotos de Liam en el aeropuerto y nadie ha visto a Louis coger un avión hacia Los Ángeles, vamos no me fastidies, estos señores están haciendo lo que les da la gana sin que nadie se entere y me alegro muchísimo por ellos.

4. No sé qué me perdí estos años que he estado más desconectada de 1D y Larry pero veo a mucha gente shippear Zarry como si fuera real. Según lo que he podido ver es que tienen “tatuajes a conjunto” (una flor en el brazo, un corazón y la calavera). Otro video que Harry dice supuestamente a Zayn sobre Two Ghosts que la escribió la primera vez que ÉL le dejó. Sinceramente me parece tan absurdo que se crea en Zarry antes que en Larry…

5. Esto ya es más opinión personal que cosas relacionadas con la actualidad de Larry. Sinceramente después de tantos años es normal que salgan dudas (no solo en tema Larry sino en cualquier cosa de la vida cotidiana), pero que ellos sigan haciendo cosas taaaan sospechosas me pone de los nervios. Creo que si alguien está hasta los huevos de que traten una amistad como relación amorosa, no dice en un tuit que es una mierda y ya está. Estoy estudiando periodismo y en una asignatura relacionada con las relaciones públicas, nos dijeron que muchas empresas tratan las “crisis” o los errores de diferentes maneras entre otras como pueden ser las cortinas de humo, ignorar lo que pasa, tirar la culpa a otros, o comunicados oficiales siendo sinceros, etc. Sin duda alguna, si yo fuera responsable de la comunicación de un artista que está cansado de que le acusen de algo, no pondría un tuit contestando a un fan para “aclarar las cosas”, tampoco diría mensajes que puedan dar a controversia sino que haría un vídeo o una rueda de prensa explicando y dejando que surjan las preguntas de la gente y poder dar explicaciones reales.

Ahora como fan, me gustaría que si en algún momento se sabe la verdad sobre Larry, si ya no están juntos o algo; solo espero que alguno de los dos tenga la decencia de decir si de verdad alguna vez ha pasado algo entre ellos porque creo que la gente se merece explicaciones más allá de saber si Larry es real o no. A mí personalmente me gustaría que escogieran cualquier vídeo con momentos Larry “innegables” y me explicasen qué pasaba ahí realmente si no fue una relación amorosa o sexual, que me dieran una explicación para todas esas “pruebas” que se han ido recogiendo a lo largo de los años de 1d.

6. Sobre The X Factor y el contrato de Louis, etc. Yo nunca he sido una persona que ha entendido demasiado bien lo de los contratos de los chicos ni los managers, etc. (Obviamente sé que Modest era una gran escoria y tal). Ahora con todo el tema de Little Mix yéndose de Modest, no sé que va a pasar con Louis y los chicos porque sé que L tiene su propia discográfica, que H está con Columbia y tal. Cómo he estado estos años algo desconectada tampoco puedo decir mucho más porque no sé exactamente como han ido las cosas. Por lo que veo a día de hoy, creo que Louis está esperando a que acabe The X Factor, no sé si para romper con Simon Cowell o qué pero espero que Louis sepa lo que hace y que todo le vaya bien porque estoy deseando LT1 con toda mi alma y no aguanto más sin escuchar su música Ajajaja.

Quiero recalcar que todo esto son pensamientos míos, que no es nada que yo pueda sacar pruebas o algo de eso, solo con meterse en Twitter y en las cuentas que hablan de L y H se puede ir sabiendo cosas de ellos, que es lo que yo hago. Qué bien me he quedado diciendo todo lo que pensaba ajajaja
